attributes.action: Hilliary Clinton to release the transcripts of her paid speeches to Wall Street
attributes.additional_details: Ms Clinton received over $600,000.00 for speeches made to Goldman Sachs. As a candidate to be the 'Leader of the Free World' it is both fair and reasonable that we know what she said to them in return for such huge sums of money.
attributes.background: The British People need to know if Hillary Clinton is working in the interests of the American People, or if she is beholden to the lobbyists and special interests of Wall Street. We call on the British Government to ask Ms Clinton to release the transcripts of her speeches to Wall Street

rejection.details: The decision about whether these transcripts should be published is not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament.
